q: explain the ''shyster rates.'' In a statement posted at the center of Chrysler's home page Saturday, Sergio Marchionne said he regrets a term he used and considers it ''inappropriate.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, Sergio Marchionne 's statement said. The key Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick was less than official, city officials explained. The official Dallas ''keys'' are made from gold or crystal and given out mostly to foreign dignitaries under strict protocol.
